Class SpenObjectTextBox.TextSpanInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.document.SpenObjectTextBox.TextSpanInfo
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SpenObjectTextBox.BackgroundColorSpanInfo, SpenObjectTextBox.BoldStyleSpanInfo, SpenObjectTextBox.FontNameSpanInfo, SpenObjectTextBox.FontSizeSpanInfo, SpenObjectTextBox.ForegroundColorSpanInfo, SpenObjectTextBox.HyperTextStyleSpanInfo, SpenObjectTextBox.ItalicStyleSpanInfo, SpenObjectTextBox.TextDirectionSpanInfo, SpenObjectTextBox.UnderlineStyleSpanInfo

    Deprecated. 
    As of 4.0.0, replaced by SpenTextSpanBase.

extends Object
    This class is deprecated in version 4.0.0. Use SpenTextSpanBase instead.

    3.0.0
